Based on these preferences, I would recommend two movies from the list:

2. 'The Rite' (2011) - While this movie is not by Minghella, it still relates to his direction due to its focus on exorcism. The film follows an American seminary student who embarks on an exorcism course in Italy, showcasing the intense and often supernatural aspects of the exorcism process.
